## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description     | Type                                     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `arrow`  | `arrow`   | Arrow position  | `"bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"` | `undefined` |
| `error`  | `error`   | Set error state | `boolean`                                | `undefined` |
| `text`   | `text`    | Set text        | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
